text: Cavite's 8th congressional district is one of the eight congressional districts of the Philippines in Cavite. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 2019. Previously included in Cavite's 7th congressional district, it was redistricted when General Trias was granted its own district, it being assigned as the new 7th district, and having remnants of the old 7th district the new 8th district. It is currently represented in the 18th Congress by Abraham Tolentino of the National Unity Party, who has represented the district since its creation. == Representation history == {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" | # ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" | Member ! colspan="2" | Term of office ! rowspan="2" | Congress ! rowspan="2" | Party ! rowspan="2" | Electoral history ! rowspan="2" width="33%" | Constituent LGUs |- ! title: Cavite's 8th congressional district
